An official website opened on Tuesday and revealed a promotional video, visual, cast, and staff. The cast includes (pictured above from left to right): Reina Ueda as Miyo Saimori Kaito Ishikaw...

Title: Anime News Network
Data: Promo video, visual, cast, staff unveiled ― Writer Akumi Agitogi and illustrator Tsukiho Tsukioka's My Happy Marriage (Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon) light novel series is getting a television anime adaptation. The cast members are: Ryūji Satō as Yūji Itadori Kazuaki Yasue as Megumi Fushiguro Erika Toyohara as Nobara Kugisaki Sara Takatsuki as Maki Zenin Fūma Sadamoto as Toge Inumaki Takeshi...                    news          3 comments       Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero Film Rescheduled to June 11 After Toei Animation Hack   Apr 15, 06:59 3 comments                 anime    Originally slated for April 22 ― Toei announced on Thursday that Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero, the second anime film in the Dragon Ball Super franchise, has been rescheduled for June 11. It had been delayed due to the Toei Animation hack last month. Toei added that the entire staff is putting all their effort into meeting the new release date. Visit news.dexclub.com for all the latest news in Thai.             CONNECTHome            Welcome to Anime News Network Connect! A collaboration between ANN and Anime NYC, ANN Connect is a new way to bring anime fans, anime creators, and the anime industry together during a time when we're all physically remote. Across this summer and fall, ANN Connect will present anime premieres, in-depth interviews with voice actors and creative talent, industry panels, and much more. Join us together online for a super streaming anime club! You can watch our live sessions on Anime News Network's official YouTube, Facebook and Twitch channels! LAST SESSION  Session 16 – Spring Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and James Beckett watch every single anime trailer for Spring 2021 LIVE! It's one of the most packed seasons in years; can they survive? Can you?  Watch it on on Facebook or Twitch.     NEXT SESSION  Session 17 – How to Edit Manga Meet the Manga Editors on March 25 at 8 Eastern / 5 Pacific! Take deep dive into the manga editing world with Ajani Oloye (Manga Editor/Translator), Carl Li (Editor, Yen Press), Haruko Hashimoto (Editor, Kodansha Comics), and Tania Biswas (Senior Editor, Square Enix). The panelists will discuss the philosophy and practice of manga editing and chat live throughout the talk! Moderated by Mark de Vera (Sales and Marketing Director, Yen Press & Wannabe Manga Editor). Watch it and chat live with the editors on YouTube. Also streaming on Facebook and Twitch, but the live-chat is only on YouTube .   PAST SESSIONS  Session 15 – Mike Daniels Lynzee Loveridge is joined by very special guest, Mike Daniels! The NFL Pro Bowler takes a deep dive into his nerdier side - geeking out about Dragon Ball Z, Gundam, Berserk, Tenchi Muyo!, and more! Learn about Mike's personal history with anime, being a geek dad, and the amazing intersection of anime and pro sports!  Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 14 – Jujutsu Kaisen A follow up to our interview with Jujutsu Kaien voice actor Robbie Daymond (Megumi Fushiguro), ANN's Jacki Jing speaks with cast members Adam McArthur (Yuji Itadori), Kaiji Tang (Satoru Gojo), Ray Chase (Ryomen Sukuna), and Anne Yatco (Nobara Kugisaki)! Learn all about anime's cursed sensation in this mega interview!   Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 13 – Robbie Daymond Join us for a special interview voice acting superstar Robbie Daymond about lending his voice to one of 2020 and 2021's biggest shows - Jujutsu Kaisen! Hear from the voice of Megumi Fushiguro about the new shonen megahit!  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 12 – Winter Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Mike Toole remember the reason for the season by watching every single anime trailer for Winter 2020 LIVE! Has Japan filled our stockings with presents or coal? Watch and chat along as we go ani-wassailing together!  Watch it on on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 11 – Mangamo A-Go-Go Calling all manga fans! Join Anime News Network manga expert Rebecca Silverman for an all-out manga discussion with Mangamo executive editor and co-founder Dallas Middaugh, whose career in manga publishing spans two decades with stops at Crunchyroll and Penguin Random House. You'll get the scoop on titles like Mangamo's December Featured Titles, latest releases and more with Rebecca's thoughts, and why Dallas curated these titles just for you in Mangamo's library, plus exciting new announcements! Mangamo is the manga subscription app that gives you access to 300+ titles from multiple publishers without limits and without ads, all while supporting manga creators. Mangamo is now available globally for iOS and Android and is offering a 30-day free trial for all new users.  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 10 – Case Closed Producer Keiichi Ishiyama ANN's Kim Morissy sits down with longtime Case Closed producer Keiichi Ishiyama for a special interview to celebrate the US releases of three Case Closed feature films! Case Closed is one of the most beloved anime sagas in Japan, and American fans can now see some of Conan's biggest cases for the first time -- Case Closed: Episode ‘One’ and Zero the Enforcer both available now and The Crimson Love Letter available for download Nov. 19! And before you dive into these Case Closed mysteries, learn from Ishiyama-san about what goes into making Case Closed, how they balance creating a movie and over 30 episodes every year, and how involved manga creator Gosho Aoyama is in the movies!  Watch it on Facebook. Session 9 – Halloween Pumpkins with Ciarán Strange Join the Anime News Network team and Special Guest Ciarán Strange for the live revealing of this year's Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest Winners! ANN and Ciarán will count down their favorites before revealing 2020's Pumpkin Carving Champion - plus an extra spooky surprise from Ciarán!  Watch on: YouTube or Twitch    Session 8 – My Hero Academia: Deku & Bakugo Voice Actor Interview Celebrate the DVD and Blu-ray release of My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising with an interview with the US voices of Deku (Justin Briner) and Bakugo (Clifford Chapin). Learn about the latest My Hero Academia movie, Deku and Bakugo's evolving relationship, and more! Watch on: YouTube, or facebook.  Session 7 – Attack on Titan ANN's Jacki Jing talks with Attack on Titan voice actor Bryce Papenbrook (Eren) and Mike McFarland (ADR Director and voice of Jean) about all things Attack on Titan. Are you ready for Attack on Titan The Final Season? Join us October 1st at 9PM ET / 6PM PT.  Watch on: YouTube, facebook.  Session 6 – Retro Crush ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole chats with Mary Gibson (Head of Acquisition) and Will Chao (Head of Content) from RetroCrush. Mary and Will are two of the key people bringing this new streaming portal dedicated to classic anime to life. Learn all this very different streaming site, its founding, community, and why Charge Man Ken is the best anime ever. Maybe. Join us September 30th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook, and YouTube worldwide. Watch on: YouTube, Twitch, facebook.  Session 5 – Shawne Kleckner ANN's Christopher Macdonald talks Shawne Kleckner, CEO and Founder of The Right Stuf International, about TRSI's 30 years in the anime industry, the company's plans for the rest of 2020 and some of the craziest things that the Darklord has seen in the last 30 years. We might even talk about Covid-19. Join us on September 24 at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific. This session will be streamed live on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide with fan interaction encouraged. Watch on: YouTube.    Session 4 - Fall Anime Season Trailer Watch Party  ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Leo Rydel strap in for a spine-tingling marathon of every. single. anime trailer for the Fall 2020 season.Tune in live on YouTube, Facebook, and Twitch on Tuesday, September 22nd at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific to get a head start on the new season before Preview Guide kicks off on October 2!   Watch on YouTube.  Session 3 – Hiro Mashima ANN's Kim Morissy talks to Hiro Mashima about Fairy Tail, Edens Zero and life as a manga artist. We'll also be asking fan submitted questions! Want to submit a question? You can either submit them in our forum here or on Twitter with the hashtag #askmashima (make sure to tag @anime). The deadline to submit questions is 5PM EDT / 2 PM PDT on Friday, September 4th.  Join us September 15th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT for the Mashima Session. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide. View on YouTube Here.  Session 2 – Our Favorite Anime of Summer 2020 ANN Executive Editor Lynzee Loveridge and reviewers Rebecca Silverman, James Beckett, and Caitlin Moore countdown their favorite anime of this summer. What are you watching and what should you be watching?  View on YouTube Here.  Session 1 – Gibiate Online Premiere On July 14th, ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole hosted the Online Premiere of the new anime Gibiate before it's Crunchyroll debut. Featuring character designs by Yoshitaka Amano and an all-star team including Tetsuya Kakihara and Sugizo. Following the premiere, Mike interviewed Gibiate Producer Ryō Aoki and Director Masahiko Komino. Did you miss the premiere? Our premiere was only available live, but we're able to continue to share Mike Toole's exclusive interview!  View on YouTube Here.     discuss this in the forum (18 posts) |        bookmark/share with:                         this article has been modified since it was originally posted;      see change history    CONNECT homepage / archives                   All material Copyright © 1998-2022 Anime News Network. Visit news.dexclub.com for all the latest news in Thai.             CONNECTHome            Welcome to Anime News Network Connect! A collaboration between ANN and Anime NYC, ANN Connect is a new way to bring anime fans, anime creators, and the anime industry together during a time when we're all physically remote. Across this summer and fall, ANN Connect will present anime premieres, in-depth interviews with voice actors and creative talent, industry panels, and much more. Join us together online for a super streaming anime club! You can watch our live sessions on Anime News Network's official YouTube, Facebook and Twitch channels! LAST SESSION  Session 16 – Spring Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and James Beckett watch every single anime trailer for Spring 2021 LIVE! It's one of the most packed seasons in years; can they survive? Can you?  Watch it on on Facebook or Twitch.     NEXT SESSION  Session 17 – How to Edit Manga Meet the Manga Editors on March 25 at 8 Eastern / 5 Pacific! Take deep dive into the manga editing world with Ajani Oloye (Manga Editor/Translator), Carl Li (Editor, Yen Press), Haruko Hashimoto (Editor, Kodansha Comics), and Tania Biswas (Senior Editor, Square Enix). The panelists will discuss the philosophy and practice of manga editing and chat live throughout the talk! Moderated by Mark de Vera (Sales and Marketing Director, Yen Press & Wannabe Manga Editor). Watch it and chat live with the editors on YouTube. Also streaming on Facebook and Twitch, but the live-chat is only on YouTube .   PAST SESSIONS  Session 15 – Mike Daniels Lynzee Loveridge is joined by very special guest, Mike Daniels! The NFL Pro Bowler takes a deep dive into his nerdier side - geeking out about Dragon Ball Z, Gundam, Berserk, Tenchi Muyo!, and more! Learn about Mike's personal history with anime, being a geek dad, and the amazing intersection of anime and pro sports!  Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 14 – Jujutsu Kaisen A follow up to our interview with Jujutsu Kaien voice actor Robbie Daymond (Megumi Fushiguro), ANN's Jacki Jing speaks with cast members Adam McArthur (Yuji Itadori), Kaiji Tang (Satoru Gojo), Ray Chase (Ryomen Sukuna), and Anne Yatco (Nobara Kugisaki)! Learn all about anime's cursed sensation in this mega interview!   Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 13 – Robbie Daymond Join us for a special interview voice acting superstar Robbie Daymond about lending his voice to one of 2020 and 2021's biggest shows - Jujutsu Kaisen! Hear from the voice of Megumi Fushiguro about the new shonen megahit!  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 12 – Winter Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Mike Toole remember the reason for the season by watching every single anime trailer for Winter 2020 LIVE! Has Japan filled our stockings with presents or coal? Watch and chat along as we go ani-wassailing together!  Watch it on on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 11 – Mangamo A-Go-Go Calling all manga fans! Join Anime News Network manga expert Rebecca Silverman for an all-out manga discussion with Mangamo executive editor and co-founder Dallas Middaugh, whose career in manga publishing spans two decades with stops at Crunchyroll and Penguin Random House. You'll get the scoop on titles like Mangamo's December Featured Titles, latest releases and more with Rebecca's thoughts, and why Dallas curated these titles just for you in Mangamo's library, plus exciting new announcements! Mangamo is the manga subscription app that gives you access to 300+ titles from multiple publishers without limits and without ads, all while supporting manga creators. Mangamo is now available globally for iOS and Android and is offering a 30-day free trial for all new users.  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 10 – Case Closed Producer Keiichi Ishiyama ANN's Kim Morissy sits down with longtime Case Closed producer Keiichi Ishiyama for a special interview to celebrate the US releases of three Case Closed feature films! Case Closed is one of the most beloved anime sagas in Japan, and American fans can now see some of Conan's biggest cases for the first time -- Case Closed: Episode ‘One’ and Zero the Enforcer both available now and The Crimson Love Letter available for download Nov. 19! And before you dive into these Case Closed mysteries, learn from Ishiyama-san about what goes into making Case Closed, how they balance creating a movie and over 30 episodes every year, and how involved manga creator Gosho Aoyama is in the movies!  Watch it on Facebook. Session 9 – Halloween Pumpkins with Ciarán Strange Join the Anime News Network team and Special Guest Ciarán Strange for the live revealing of this year's Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest Winners! ANN and Ciarán will count down their favorites before revealing 2020's Pumpkin Carving Champion - plus an extra spooky surprise from Ciarán!  Watch on: YouTube or Twitch    Session 8 – My Hero Academia: Deku & Bakugo Voice Actor Interview Celebrate the DVD and Blu-ray release of My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising with an interview with the US voices of Deku (Justin Briner) and Bakugo (Clifford Chapin). Learn about the latest My Hero Academia movie, Deku and Bakugo's evolving relationship, and more! Watch on: YouTube, or facebook.  Session 7 – Attack on Titan ANN's Jacki Jing talks with Attack on Titan voice actor Bryce Papenbrook (Eren) and Mike McFarland (ADR Director and voice of Jean) about all things Attack on Titan. Are you ready for Attack on Titan The Final Season? Join us October 1st at 9PM ET / 6PM PT.  Watch on: YouTube, facebook.  Session 6 – Retro Crush ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole chats with Mary Gibson (Head of Acquisition) and Will Chao (Head of Content) from RetroCrush. Mary and Will are two of the key people bringing this new streaming portal dedicated to classic anime to life. Learn all this very different streaming site, its founding, community, and why Charge Man Ken is the best anime ever. Maybe. Join us September 30th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook, and YouTube worldwide. Watch on: YouTube, Twitch, facebook.  Session 5 – Shawne Kleckner ANN's Christopher Macdonald talks Shawne Kleckner, CEO and Founder of The Right Stuf International, about TRSI's 30 years in the anime industry, the company's plans for the rest of 2020 and some of the craziest things that the Darklord has seen in the last 30 years. We might even talk about Covid-19. Join us on September 24 at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific. This session will be streamed live on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide with fan interaction encouraged. Watch on: YouTube.    Session 4 - Fall Anime Season Trailer Watch Party  ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Leo Rydel strap in for a spine-tingling marathon of every. single. anime trailer for the Fall 2020 season.Tune in live on YouTube, Facebook, and Twitch on Tuesday, September 22nd at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific to get a head start on the new season before Preview Guide kicks off on October 2!   Watch on YouTube.  Session 3 – Hiro Mashima ANN's Kim Morissy talks to Hiro Mashima about Fairy Tail, Edens Zero and life as a manga artist. We'll also be asking fan submitted questions! Want to submit a question? You can either submit them in our forum here or on Twitter with the hashtag #askmashima (make sure to tag @anime). The deadline to submit questions is 5PM EDT / 2 PM PDT on Friday, September 4th.  Join us September 15th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT for the Mashima Session. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide. View on YouTube Here.  Session 2 – Our Favorite Anime of Summer 2020 ANN Executive Editor Lynzee Loveridge and reviewers Rebecca Silverman, James Beckett, and Caitlin Moore countdown their favorite anime of this summer. What are you watching and what should you be watching?  View on YouTube Here.  Session 1 – Gibiate Online Premiere On July 14th, ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole hosted the Online Premiere of the new anime Gibiate before it's Crunchyroll debut. Featuring character designs by Yoshitaka Amano and an all-star team including Tetsuya Kakihara and Sugizo. Following the premiere, Mike interviewed Gibiate Producer Ryō Aoki and Director Masahiko Komino. Did you miss the premiere? Our premiere was only available live, but we're able to continue to share Mike Toole's exclusive interview!  View on YouTube Here.     discuss this in the forum (18 posts) |        bookmark/share with:                         this article has been modified since it was originally posted;      see change history    CONNECT homepage / archives                   All material Copyright © 1998-2022 Anime News Network. Session 9 – Halloween Pumpkins with Ciarán Strange Join the Anime News Network team and Special Guest Ciarán Strange for the live revealing of this year's Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest Winners! ANN and Ciarán will count down their favorites before revealing 2020's Pumpkin Carving Champion - plus an extra spooky surprise from Ciarán!  Watch on: YouTube or Twitch    Session 8 – My Hero Academia: Deku & Bakugo Voice Actor Interview Celebrate the DVD and Blu-ray release of My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising with an interview with the US voices of Deku (Justin Briner) and Bakugo (Clifford Chapin). Learn about the latest My Hero Academia movie, Deku and Bakugo's evolving relationship, and more! Watch on: YouTube, or facebook.  Session 7 – Attack on Titan ANN's Jacki Jing talks with Attack on Titan voice actor Bryce Papenbrook (Eren) and Mike McFarland (ADR Director and voice of Jean) about all things Attack on Titan. Are you ready for Attack on Titan The Final Season? Join us October 1st at 9PM ET / 6PM PT.  Watch on: YouTube, facebook.  Session 6 – Retro Crush ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole chats with Mary Gibson (Head of Acquisition) and Will Chao (Head of Content) from RetroCrush. Mary and Will are two of the key people bringing this new streaming portal dedicated to classic anime to life. Learn all this very different streaming site, its founding, community, and why Charge Man Ken is the best anime ever. Maybe. Join us September 30th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook, and YouTube worldwide. Watch on: YouTube, Twitch, facebook.  Session 5 – Shawne Kleckner ANN's Christopher Macdonald talks Shawne Kleckner, CEO and Founder of The Right Stuf International, about TRSI's 30 years in the anime industry, the company's plans for the rest of 2020 and some of the craziest things that the Darklord has seen in the last 30 years. We might even talk about Covid-19. Join us on September 24 at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific. This session will be streamed live on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide with fan interaction encouraged. Watch on: YouTube.    Session 4 - Fall Anime Season Trailer Watch Party  ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Leo Rydel strap in for a spine-tingling marathon of every. single. anime trailer for the Fall 2020 season.Tune in live on YouTube, Facebook, and Twitch on Tuesday, September 22nd at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific to get a head start on the new season before Preview Guide kicks off on October 2!   Watch on YouTube.  Session 3 – Hiro Mashima ANN's Kim Morissy talks to Hiro Mashima about Fairy Tail, Edens Zero and life as a manga artist. We'll also be asking fan submitted questions! Want to submit a question? You can either submit them in our forum here or on Twitter with the hashtag #askmashima (make sure to tag @anime). The deadline to submit questions is 5PM EDT / 2 PM PDT on Friday, September 4th.  Join us September 15th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT for the Mashima Session. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide. View on YouTube Here.  Session 2 – Our Favorite Anime of Summer 2020 ANN Executive Editor Lynzee Loveridge and reviewers Rebecca Silverman, James Beckett, and Caitlin Moore countdown their favorite anime of this summer. What are you watching and what should you be watching?  View on YouTube Here.  Session 1 – Gibiate Online Premiere On July 14th, ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole hosted the Online Premiere of the new anime Gibiate before it's Crunchyroll debut. Featuring character designs by Yoshitaka Amano and an all-star team including Tetsuya Kakihara and Sugizo. Following the premiere, Mike interviewed Gibiate Producer Ryō Aoki and Director Masahiko Komino. Did you miss the premiere? Our premiere was only available live, but we're able to continue to share Mike Toole's exclusive interview!  View on YouTube Here.     discuss this in the forum (18 posts) |        bookmark/share with:                         this article has been modified since it was originally posted;      see change history    CONNECT homepage / archives                   All material Copyright © 1998-2022 Anime News Network. All rights reserved. served by ruka-chan

Title: Home - Anime News Network:SEA

Visit news.dexclub.com for all the latest news in Thai.             CONNECTHome            Welcome to Anime News Network Connect! A collaboration between ANN and Anime NYC, ANN Connect is a new way to bring anime fans, anime creators, and the anime industry together during a time when we're all physically remote. Across this summer and fall, ANN Connect will present anime premieres, in-depth interviews with voice actors and creative talent, industry panels, and much more. Join us together online for a super streaming anime club! You can watch our live sessions on Anime News Network's official YouTube, Facebook and Twitch channels! LAST SESSION  Session 16 – Spring Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and James Beckett watch every single anime trailer for Spring 2021 LIVE! It's one of the most packed seasons in years; can they survive? Can you?  Watch it on on Facebook or Twitch.     NEXT SESSION  Session 17 – How to Edit Manga Meet the Manga Editors on March 25 at 8 Eastern / 5 Pacific! Take deep dive into the manga editing world with Ajani Oloye (Manga Editor/Translator), Carl Li (Editor, Yen Press), Haruko Hashimoto (Editor, Kodansha Comics), and Tania Biswas (Senior Editor, Square Enix). The panelists will discuss the philosophy and practice of manga editing and chat live throughout the talk! Moderated by Mark de Vera (Sales and Marketing Director, Yen Press & Wannabe Manga Editor). Watch it and chat live with the editors on YouTube. Also streaming on Facebook and Twitch, but the live-chat is only on YouTube .   PAST SESSIONS  Session 15 – Mike Daniels Lynzee Loveridge is joined by very special guest, Mike Daniels! The NFL Pro Bowler takes a deep dive into his nerdier side - geeking out about Dragon Ball Z, Gundam, Berserk, Tenchi Muyo!, and more! Learn about Mike's personal history with anime, being a geek dad, and the amazing intersection of anime and pro sports!  Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 14 – Jujutsu Kaisen A follow up to our interview with Jujutsu Kaien voice actor Robbie Daymond (Megumi Fushiguro), ANN's Jacki Jing speaks with cast members Adam McArthur (Yuji Itadori), Kaiji Tang (Satoru Gojo), Ray Chase (Ryomen Sukuna), and Anne Yatco (Nobara Kugisaki)! Learn all about anime's cursed sensation in this mega interview!   Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 13 – Robbie Daymond Join us for a special interview voice acting superstar Robbie Daymond about lending his voice to one of 2020 and 2021's biggest shows - Jujutsu Kaisen! Hear from the voice of Megumi Fushiguro about the new shonen megahit!  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 12 – Winter Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Mike Toole remember the reason for the season by watching every single anime trailer for Winter 2020 LIVE! Has Japan filled our stockings with presents or coal? Watch and chat along as we go ani-wassailing together!  Watch it on on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 11 – Mangamo A-Go-Go Calling all manga fans! Join Anime News Network manga expert Rebecca Silverman for an all-out manga discussion with Mangamo executive editor and co-founder Dallas Middaugh, whose career in manga publishing spans two decades with stops at Crunchyroll and Penguin Random House. You'll get the scoop on titles like Mangamo's December Featured Titles, latest releases and more with Rebecca's thoughts, and why Dallas curated these titles just for you in Mangamo's library, plus exciting new announcements! Mangamo is the manga subscription app that gives you access to 300+ titles from multiple publishers without limits and without ads, all while supporting manga creators. Mangamo is now available globally for iOS and Android and is offering a 30-day free trial for all new users.  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 10 – Case Closed Producer Keiichi Ishiyama ANN's Kim Morissy sits down with longtime Case Closed producer Keiichi Ishiyama for a special interview to celebrate the US releases of three Case Closed feature films! Case Closed is one of the most beloved anime sagas in Japan, and American fans can now see some of Conan's biggest cases for the first time -- Case Closed: Episode ‘One’ and Zero the Enforcer both available now and The Crimson Love Letter available for download Nov. 19! And before you dive into these Case Closed mysteries, learn from Ishiyama-san about what goes into making Case Closed, how they balance creating a movie and over 30 episodes every year, and how involved manga creator Gosho Aoyama is in the movies!  Watch it on Facebook. Session 9 – Halloween Pumpkins with Ciarán Strange Join the Anime News Network team and Special Guest Ciarán Strange for the live revealing of this year's Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest Winners! ANN and Ciarán will count down their favorites before revealing 2020's Pumpkin Carving Champion - plus an extra spooky surprise from Ciarán!  Watch on: YouTube or Twitch    Session 8 – My Hero Academia: Deku & Bakugo Voice Actor Interview Celebrate the DVD and Blu-ray release of My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising with an interview with the US voices of Deku (Justin Briner) and Bakugo (Clifford Chapin). Learn about the latest My Hero Academia movie, Deku and Bakugo's evolving relationship, and more! Watch on: YouTube, or facebook. Are you ready for Attack on Titan The Final Season? Join us October 1st at 9PM ET / 6PM PT.  Watch on: YouTube, facebook. Mary and Will are two of the key people bringing this new streaming portal dedicated to classic anime to life. Want to submit a question? You can either submit them in our forum here or on Twitter with the hashtag #askmashima (make sure to tag @anime). Session 1 – Gibiate Online Premiere On July 14th, ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole hosted the Online Premiere of the new anime Gibiate before it's Crunchyroll debut. Featuring character designs by Yoshitaka Amano and an all-star team including Tetsuya Kakihara and Sugizo. Following the premiere, Mike interviewed Gibiate Producer Ryō Aoki and Director Masahiko Komino. Did you miss the premiere? Our premiere was only available live, but we're able to continue to share Mike Toole's exclusive interview!  View on YouTube Here.     discuss this in the forum (18 posts) |        bookmark/share with:                         this article has been modified since it was originally posted;      see change history    CONNECT homepage / archives

Title: Home - Anime News Network:SEA
Data: CONNECTHome            Welcome to Anime News Network Connect! A collaboration between ANN and Anime NYC, ANN Connect is a new way to bring anime fans, anime creators, and the anime industry together during a time when we're all physically remote. Across this summer and fall, ANN Connect will present anime premieres, in-depth interviews with voice actors and creative talent, industry panels, and much more. Join us together online for a super streaming anime club! You can watch our live sessions on Anime News Network's official YouTube, Facebook and Twitch channels! LAST SESSION  Session 16 – Spring Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and James Beckett watch every single anime trailer for Spring 2021 LIVE! It's one of the most packed seasons in years; can they survive? Can you?  Watch it on on Facebook or Twitch.     NEXT SESSION  Session 17 – How to Edit Manga Meet the Manga Editors on March 25 at 8 Eastern / 5 Pacific! Take deep dive into the manga editing world with Ajani Oloye (Manga Editor/Translator), Carl Li (Editor, Yen Press), Haruko Hashimoto (Editor, Kodansha Comics), and Tania Biswas (Senior Editor, Square Enix). The panelists will discuss the philosophy and practice of manga editing and chat live throughout the talk! Moderated by Mark de Vera (Sales and Marketing Director, Yen Press & Wannabe Manga Editor). Watch it and chat live with the editors on YouTube. Also streaming on Facebook and Twitch, but the live-chat is only on YouTube .   PAST SESSIONS  Session 15 – Mike Daniels Lynzee Loveridge is joined by very special guest, Mike Daniels! The NFL Pro Bowler takes a deep dive into his nerdier side - geeking out about Dragon Ball Z, Gundam, Berserk, Tenchi Muyo!, and more! Learn about Mike's personal history with anime, being a geek dad, and the amazing intersection of anime and pro sports!  Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 14 – Jujutsu Kaisen A follow up to our interview with Jujutsu Kaien voice actor Robbie Daymond (Megumi Fushiguro), ANN's Jacki Jing speaks with cast members Adam McArthur (Yuji Itadori), Kaiji Tang (Satoru Gojo), Ray Chase (Ryomen Sukuna), and Anne Yatco (Nobara Kugisaki)! Learn all about anime's cursed sensation in this mega interview!   Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 13 – Robbie Daymond Join us for a special interview voice acting superstar Robbie Daymond about lending his voice to one of 2020 and 2021's biggest shows - Jujutsu Kaisen! Hear from the voice of Megumi Fushiguro about the new shonen megahit!  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 12 – Winter Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Mike Toole remember the reason for the season by watching every single anime trailer for Winter 2020 LIVE! Has Japan filled our stockings with presents or coal? Watch and chat along as we go ani-wassailing together!  Watch it on on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 11 – Mangamo A-Go-Go Calling all manga fans! Join Anime News Network manga expert Rebecca Silverman for an all-out manga discussion with Mangamo executive editor and co-founder Dallas Middaugh, whose career in manga publishing spans two decades with stops at Crunchyroll and Penguin Random House. You'll get the scoop on titles like Mangamo's December Featured Titles, latest releases and more with Rebecca's thoughts, and why Dallas curated these titles just for you in Mangamo's library, plus exciting new announcements! Mangamo is the manga subscription app that gives you access to 300+ titles from multiple publishers without limits and without ads, all while supporting manga creators. Mangamo is now available globally for iOS and Android and is offering a 30-day free trial for all new users.  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 10 – Case Closed Producer Keiichi Ishiyama ANN's Kim Morissy sits down with longtime Case Closed producer Keiichi Ishiyama for a special interview to celebrate the US releases of three Case Closed feature films! Case Closed is one of the most beloved anime sagas in Japan, and American fans can now see some of Conan's biggest cases for the first time -- Case Closed: Episode ‘One’ and Zero the Enforcer both available now and The Crimson Love Letter available for download Nov. 19! And before you dive into these Case Closed mysteries, learn from Ishiyama-san about what goes into making Case Closed, how they balance creating a movie and over 30 episodes every year, and how involved manga creator Gosho Aoyama is in the movies!  Watch it on Facebook. Session 9 – Halloween Pumpkins with Ciarán Strange Join the Anime News Network team and Special Guest Ciarán Strange for the live revealing of this year's Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest Winners! ANN and Ciarán will count down their favorites before revealing 2020's Pumpkin Carving Champion - plus an extra spooky surprise from Ciarán!  Watch on: YouTube or Twitch    Session 8 – My Hero Academia: Deku & Bakugo Voice Actor Interview Celebrate the DVD and Blu-ray release of My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising with an interview with the US voices of Deku (Justin Briner) and Bakugo (Clifford Chapin). Learn about the latest My Hero Academia movie, Deku and Bakugo's evolving relationship, and more! Watch on: YouTube, or facebook.  Session 7 – Attack on Titan ANN's Jacki Jing talks with Attack on Titan voice actor Bryce Papenbrook (Eren) and Mike McFarland (ADR Director and voice of Jean) about all things Attack on Titan. Are you ready for Attack on Titan The Final Season? Join us October 1st at 9PM ET / 6PM PT.  Watch on: YouTube, facebook.  Session 6 – Retro Crush ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole chats with Mary Gibson (Head of Acquisition) and Will Chao (Head of Content) from RetroCrush. Mary and Will are two of the key people bringing this new streaming portal dedicated to classic anime to life. Learn all this very different streaming site, its founding, community, and why Charge Man Ken is the best anime ever. Maybe. Join us September 30th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook, and YouTube worldwide. Watch on: YouTube, Twitch, facebook.  Session 5 – Shawne Kleckner ANN's Christopher Macdonald talks Shawne Kleckner, CEO and Founder of The Right Stuf International, about TRSI's 30 years in the anime industry, the company's plans for the rest of 2020 and some of the craziest things that the Darklord has seen in the last 30 years. We might even talk about Covid-19. Join us on September 24 at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific. This session will be streamed live on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide with fan interaction encouraged. Watch on: YouTube.    Session 4 - Fall Anime Season Trailer Watch Party  ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Leo Rydel strap in for a spine-tingling marathon of every. single. anime trailer for the Fall 2020 season.Tune in live on YouTube, Facebook, and Twitch on Tuesday, September 22nd at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific to get a head start on the new season before Preview Guide kicks off on October 2!   Watch on YouTube.  Session 3 – Hiro Mashima ANN's Kim Morissy talks to Hiro Mashima about Fairy Tail, Edens Zero and life as a manga artist. We'll also be asking fan submitted questions! Want to submit a question? You can either submit them in our forum here or on Twitter with the hashtag #askmashima (make sure to tag @anime). The deadline to submit questions is 5PM EDT / 2 PM PDT on Friday, September 4th.  Join us September 15th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT for the Mashima Session. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide. View on YouTube Here.  Session 2 – Our Favorite Anime of Summer 2020 ANN Executive Editor Lynzee Loveridge and reviewers Rebecca Silverman, James Beckett, and Caitlin Moore countdown their favorite anime of this summer. What are you watching and what should you be watching?  View on YouTube Here.  Session 1 – Gibiate Online Premiere On July 14th, ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole hosted the Online Premiere of the new anime Gibiate before it's Crunchyroll debut. Featuring character designs by Yoshitaka Amano and an all-star team including Tetsuya Kakihara and Sugizo. Following the premiere, Mike interviewed Gibiate Producer Ryō Aoki and Director Masahiko Komino. Did you miss the premiere? Our premiere was only available live, but we're able to continue to share Mike Toole's exclusive interview!  View on YouTube Here.     discuss this in the forum (18 posts) |        bookmark/share with:                         this article has been modified since it was originally posted;      see change history    CONNECT homepage / archives

Title: Home - Anime News Network:SEA
Data: Welcome to Anime News Network Connect! A collaboration between ANN and Anime NYC, ANN Connect is a new way to bring anime fans, anime creators, and the anime industry together during a time when we're all physically remote. Across this summer and fall, ANN Connect will present anime premieres, in-depth interviews with voice actors and creative talent, industry panels, and much more. Join us together online for a super streaming anime club! You can watch our live sessions on Anime News Network's official YouTube, Facebook and Twitch channels! LAST SESSION  Session 16 – Spring Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and James Beckett watch every single anime trailer for Spring 2021 LIVE! It's one of the most packed seasons in years; can they survive? Can you?  Watch it on on Facebook or Twitch.     NEXT SESSION  Session 17 – How to Edit Manga Meet the Manga Editors on March 25 at 8 Eastern / 5 Pacific! Take deep dive into the manga editing world with Ajani Oloye (Manga Editor/Translator), Carl Li (Editor, Yen Press), Haruko Hashimoto (Editor, Kodansha Comics), and Tania Biswas (Senior Editor, Square Enix). The panelists will discuss the philosophy and practice of manga editing and chat live throughout the talk! Moderated by Mark de Vera (Sales and Marketing Director, Yen Press & Wannabe Manga Editor). Watch it and chat live with the editors on YouTube. Also streaming on Facebook and Twitch, but the live-chat is only on YouTube .   PAST SESSIONS  Session 15 – Mike Daniels Lynzee Loveridge is joined by very special guest, Mike Daniels! The NFL Pro Bowler takes a deep dive into his nerdier side - geeking out about Dragon Ball Z, Gundam, Berserk, Tenchi Muyo!, and more! Learn about Mike's personal history with anime, being a geek dad, and the amazing intersection of anime and pro sports!  Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 14 – Jujutsu Kaisen A follow up to our interview with Jujutsu Kaien voice actor Robbie Daymond (Megumi Fushiguro), ANN's Jacki Jing speaks with cast members Adam McArthur (Yuji Itadori), Kaiji Tang (Satoru Gojo), Ray Chase (Ryomen Sukuna), and Anne Yatco (Nobara Kugisaki)! Learn all about anime's cursed sensation in this mega interview!   Watch it on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 13 – Robbie Daymond Join us for a special interview voice acting superstar Robbie Daymond about lending his voice to one of 2020 and 2021's biggest shows - Jujutsu Kaisen! Hear from the voice of Megumi Fushiguro about the new shonen megahit!  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 12 – Winter Anime Season Trailer Watch Party ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Mike Toole remember the reason for the season by watching every single anime trailer for Winter 2020 LIVE! Has Japan filled our stockings with presents or coal? Watch and chat along as we go ani-wassailing together!  Watch it on on YouTube or Facebook.  Session 11 – Mangamo A-Go-Go Calling all manga fans! Join Anime News Network manga expert Rebecca Silverman for an all-out manga discussion with Mangamo executive editor and co-founder Dallas Middaugh, whose career in manga publishing spans two decades with stops at Crunchyroll and Penguin Random House. You'll get the scoop on titles like Mangamo's December Featured Titles, latest releases and more with Rebecca's thoughts, and why Dallas curated these titles just for you in Mangamo's library, plus exciting new announcements! Mangamo is the manga subscription app that gives you access to 300+ titles from multiple publishers without limits and without ads, all while supporting manga creators. Mangamo is now available globally for iOS and Android and is offering a 30-day free trial for all new users.  Watch it on YouTube, or Facebook.  Session 10 – Case Closed Producer Keiichi Ishiyama ANN's Kim Morissy sits down with longtime Case Closed producer Keiichi Ishiyama for a special interview to celebrate the US releases of three Case Closed feature films! Case Closed is one of the most beloved anime sagas in Japan, and American fans can now see some of Conan's biggest cases for the first time -- Case Closed: Episode ‘One’ and Zero the Enforcer both available now and The Crimson Love Letter available for download Nov. 19! And before you dive into these Case Closed mysteries, learn from Ishiyama-san about what goes into making Case Closed, how they balance creating a movie and over 30 episodes every year, and how involved manga creator Gosho Aoyama is in the movies!  Watch it on Facebook. Session 9 – Halloween Pumpkins with Ciarán Strange Join the Anime News Network team and Special Guest Ciarán Strange for the live revealing of this year's Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest Winners! ANN and Ciarán will count down their favorites before revealing 2020's Pumpkin Carving Champion - plus an extra spooky surprise from Ciarán!  Watch on: YouTube or Twitch    Session 8 – My Hero Academia: Deku & Bakugo Voice Actor Interview Celebrate the DVD and Blu-ray release of My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising with an interview with the US voices of Deku (Justin Briner) and Bakugo (Clifford Chapin). Learn about the latest My Hero Academia movie, Deku and Bakugo's evolving relationship, and more! Watch on: YouTube, or facebook.  Session 7 – Attack on Titan ANN's Jacki Jing talks with Attack on Titan voice actor Bryce Papenbrook (Eren) and Mike McFarland (ADR Director and voice of Jean) about all things Attack on Titan. Are you ready for Attack on Titan The Final Season? Join us October 1st at 9PM ET / 6PM PT.  Watch on: YouTube, facebook.  Session 6 – Retro Crush ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole chats with Mary Gibson (Head of Acquisition) and Will Chao (Head of Content) from RetroCrush. Mary and Will are two of the key people bringing this new streaming portal dedicated to classic anime to life. Learn all this very different streaming site, its founding, community, and why Charge Man Ken is the best anime ever. Maybe. Join us September 30th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook, and YouTube worldwide. Watch on: YouTube, Twitch, facebook.  Session 5 – Shawne Kleckner ANN's Christopher Macdonald talks Shawne Kleckner, CEO and Founder of The Right Stuf International, about TRSI's 30 years in the anime industry, the company's plans for the rest of 2020 and some of the craziest things that the Darklord has seen in the last 30 years. We might even talk about Covid-19. Join us on September 24 at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific. This session will be streamed live on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide with fan interaction encouraged. Watch on: YouTube.    Session 4 - Fall Anime Season Trailer Watch Party  ANN's Lynzee Loveridge, Jacki Jing, and Leo Rydel strap in for a spine-tingling marathon of every. single. anime trailer for the Fall 2020 season.Tune in live on YouTube, Facebook, and Twitch on Tuesday, September 22nd at 9PM Eastern / 6 PM Pacific to get a head start on the new season before Preview Guide kicks off on October 2!   Watch on YouTube.  Session 3 – Hiro Mashima ANN's Kim Morissy talks to Hiro Mashima about Fairy Tail, Edens Zero and life as a manga artist. We'll also be asking fan submitted questions! Want to submit a question? You can either submit them in our forum here or on Twitter with the hashtag #askmashima (make sure to tag @anime). The deadline to submit questions is 5PM EDT / 2 PM PDT on Friday, September 4th.  Join us September 15th at 9PM EDT / 6PM PDT for the Mashima Session. This session will be streamed on Twitch, Facebook and YouTube and will be accessible worldwide. View on YouTube Here.  Session 2 – Our Favorite Anime of Summer 2020 ANN Executive Editor Lynzee Loveridge and reviewers Rebecca Silverman, James Beckett, and Caitlin Moore countdown their favorite anime of this summer. What are you watching and what should you be watching?  View on YouTube Here.  Session 1 – Gibiate Online Premiere On July 14th, ANN Editor at Large Mike Toole hosted the Online Premiere of the new anime Gibiate before it's Crunchyroll debut. Featuring character designs by Yoshitaka Amano and an all-star team including Tetsuya Kakihara and Sugizo. Following the premiere, Mike interviewed Gibiate Producer Ryō Aoki and Director Masahiko Komino. Did you miss the premiere? Our premiere was only available live, but we're able to continue to share Mike Toole's exclusive interview!  View on YouTube Here.

Founded in 1998, Anime News Network is the world's leading source of up to date news and information on the anime and manga industries. Founded in 1998, Anime News Network is the world's leading source of up to date news and information on the anime and manga industries. Regular readers of Anime News Network not only include hundreds of thousands of anime fans, but also all of the industry heavy weights. The past several years have witnessed an attrition of English anime news sites on the Internet; as the number of sites shrink, the remaining sites only get better. Consistently growing and improving, Anime News Network is here to stay. The key benefit in advertising on Anime News Network is that our readership fits a particular demographic; mature anime fans. The majority of visitors to Anime News Network are between the ages of 18 and 24 and, needless to say, they're all anime fans, but also have a healthy appetite for other forms of animation, video games, and many other related interests. As long as you are interested in reaching anime fans that make their own purchasing decisions, Anime News Network is the ideal place for you to advertise. Non Profit Anime and Manga Conventions under 30K attendance: We can trade you for 100% of your advertising on ANN. Provide ANN with up to $5,000 of advertising in your program guide or on site, and we will provide you an equal value on ANN.  Other Anime, manga and geek culture conventions: We provide a 50% trade with no max value. You can pay for half the value of your advertisements on ANN with advertisements in your program guide or on-site. EG: If you give us $5,000 of ads at the convention, you only have to pay us $5,000 for $10,000 worth of advertising on ANN.  For Networks We are not looking for any advertising networks at this time. Agencies and rep firms are welcome to contact us, but no networks/exchanges/rtb platforms. No Bootlegs! No Pirates! Important: Don't waste our time if you sell bootleg/pirate DVDs or host unlicensed content on your website. Title: Advertising - Anime News Network:SEA
Data: ×  remind me tomorrow remind me next week never remind me      Subscribe to the ANN Newsletter • Wake up every Sunday to a curated list of ANN's most interesting posts of the week.    read more           ข่าวสารและบทความของ Anime News Network ในรูปแบบภาษาไทย สามารถติดตามอ่านได้แล้วที่ DEXclub         กรุณาเข้าไปเยี่ยมชมได้ที่ news.dexclub.com เพื่อติดตามอ่านข่าวสารล่าสุดในรูปแบบภาษาไทย          Anime News Network's news and articles are available in Thai from DEXclub.         Visit news.dexclub.com for all the latest news in Thai.                Advertising              Thank you for your interest in advertising on Anime News Network. Founded in 1998, Anime News Network is the world's leading source of up to date news and information on the anime and manga industries. Regular readers of Anime News Network not only include hundreds of thousands of anime fans, but also all of the industry heavy weights. The past several years have witnessed an attrition of English anime news sites on the Internet; as the number of sites shrink, the remaining sites only get better. Consistently growing and improving, Anime News Network is here to stay. The key benefit in advertising on Anime News Network is that our readership fits a particular demographic; mature anime fans. The majority of visitors to Anime News Network are between the ages of 18 and 24 and, needless to say, they're all anime fans, but also have a healthy appetite for other forms of animation, video games, and many other related interests. As long as you are interested in reaching anime fans that make their own purchasing decisions, Anime News Network is the ideal place for you to advertise. Please contact us at [email protected] (advertising at animenewsnetwork.com) for more information regarding advertising opportunities. Self-Serve ANN's minimum buy is $3000, but if your budget is lower than $3000 you can now buy ads directly from our self-serve advertising system. The minimum buy is only $10.   The self serve system is also great for people who know what they want and don't want to waste time.   What are you waiting for? Buy ads right here, right now.  Want to Trade? With the exception of anime conventions and charities, ANN does not trade advertising.  Convention Trades The convention trades are back! We have two trade programs available.    Non Profit Anime and Manga Conventions under 30K attendance: We can trade you for 100% of your advertising on ANN. Provide ANN with up to $5,000 of advertising in your program guide or on site, and we will provide you an equal value on ANN.  Other Anime, manga and geek culture conventions: We provide a 50% trade with no max value. You can pay for half the value of your advertisements on ANN with advertisements in your program guide or on-site. EG: If you give us $5,000 of ads at the convention, you only have to pay us $5,000 for $10,000 worth of advertising on ANN.  For Networks We are not looking for any advertising networks at this time. Agencies and rep firms are welcome to contact us, but no networks/exchanges/rtb platforms. No Bootlegs! No Pirates! Important: Don't waste our time if you sell bootleg/pirate DVDs or host unlicensed content on your website. Not only will we not allow you to advertise with us, but we'll probably report you to the appropriate authorities, licensors and/or licensees. We do not consider gray market imports of otherwise legal goods, or doujinshi, "bootlegs," although we may require potential advertisers to prove that their gray market imports are legal goods.             bookmark/share with:                         this article has been modified since it was originally posted;      see change history    Misc Page homepage / archives           RightStuf - Anime, Manga and More

Back to top                  Anne F    Joined: 17 Sep 2021 		    Posts: 42       Posted: Thu Apr 14, 2022 6:44 am            I was gushing about the cast last night when this was announced! I know pretty much nothing about JJK other than it's not my cup of tea, but I am so in love with some of the cast that I may watch this of they do a livestream and it's not region-locked!   Ryuji is an absolute beast and I love him in everything I've seen him in. Truly a remarkable actor who has limitless energy. He's done multiple 1 1/2-2 hour solo performances with multiple costume changes with no breaks. It's incredible to watch.   Ray is another phenomenal actor! It's always such a treat to watch him! Masanari is also wonderful! I've only seen him in the drama King of Dance, but I really enjoyed his performance! Some of his stage performances are on my long list of plays to watch like KHR and TouSute. Kazuaki is great! I've seen him in Sanrio Danshi and Kyoto Samurai Boys and enjoyed both performances!   And Mokkun (Motohiro Ota)! I love Mokkun so much. He is an absolute treasure! His performance as Yuko in XXXHolic was stellar! He's also fantastic as Sengo in TouMyu. I do want to see his non-2.5D performances.   These actors (and likely the other actors and actresses I'm not familiar with) are very athletic and can certainly benchpress more than their cellphone. I'm so excited! Props to the costuming department.      Back to top                  Anne F    Joined: 17 Sep 2021 		    Posts: 42       Posted: Thu Apr 14, 2022 6:44 am            I was gushing about the cast last night when this was announced! I know pretty much nothing about JJK other than it's not my cup of tea, but I am so in love with some of the cast that I may watch this of they do a livestream and it's not region-locked!   Ryuji is an absolute beast and I love him in everything I've seen him in. Truly a remarkable actor who has limitless energy. He's done multiple 1 1/2-2 hour solo performances with multiple costume changes with no breaks. It's incredible to watch.   Ray is another phenomenal actor! It's always such a treat to watch him! Masanari is also wonderful! I've only seen him in the drama King of Dance, but I really enjoyed his performance! Some of his stage performances are on my long list of plays to watch like KHR and TouSute. Kazuaki is great! I've seen him in Sanrio Danshi and Kyoto Samurai Boys and enjoyed both performances!   And Mokkun (Motohiro Ota)! I love Mokkun so much. He is an absolute treasure! His performance as Yuko in XXXHolic was stellar! He's also fantastic as Sengo in TouMyu. I do want to see his non-2.5D performances.   These actors (and likely the other actors and actresses I'm not familiar with) are very athletic and can certainly benchpress more than their cellphone. I'm so excited!
